item.title: Clip Collector For YouTube True Crime Videos! - Upwork
item.description:
Hello,

We are a fast growing media company who specialise in producing content for YouTube.

We're in search of a clip-collector to join the team.

Your job will entail finding clips from true-crime bodycam footage and compiling it into a list for scriptwriters.

Example:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uzy-wxNXVjo
All the footage you see from the video above is found on YouTube, we will be providing you a title like this and you must find the most engaging clips that relate. More on that later.

Budget: $100
Posted On: July 02, 2024 03:12 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Production, Education
Skills: Video Production, Education
Country: New Zealand
click to apply

item.title: DJ App Ad Creator - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented individual to create ads for our DJ app. This app is specifically designed for DJs who use Serato. It would be preferred if the person applying for this gig is a DJ themselves, as they would have a better understanding of the target audience and the type of content that would engage them. The main objective of this gig is to create visually appealing and compelling ads that will attract DJs to download and use our app. The successful candidate should have expertise in graphic design and marketing, with a good understanding of the DJ industry and Serato software.

The app is a recorder for DJ sets with additional feature for ease of use.

Budget: $300
Posted On: July 02, 2024 02:58 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, Social Media Marketing, Video Editing, Facebook
Skills: Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, Social Media Marketing, Video Editing, Facebook
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Color adjust and crop photos - Upwork
item.description:
I have 157 raw photos that are partially edited but need additional help

Here are the primary tasks:
1) Crop and center the images so the sun/moon are moving down and to the right of the image
2) Adjust the colors and lighting so the images are consistent throughout that video.

Task #1 is the highest priority item. I have them as .ARW (Sony raw) but am happy to convert them.

Attached is what the images look like when they are put in video form. It close to a great video but it's still a bit far away.

Any help would be greatly appreciated.

Regards,
Ateev Gupta

Hourly Range: $10.00-$35.00
Posted On: July 02, 2024 02:57 UTC
Category: Image Editing
Skills:RAW, Photo Editing, Image Editing
Skills: RAW, Photo Editing, Image Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Youtube Video Editor For A Faceless Channel - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for an experienced YouTube video editor for a (Faceless) Fitness channel.
This is a LONG TERM position with GREAT benefits like bonuses and raises based on quality work and performance!
You are responsible for creating engaging 8-9 minutes video 1-2 times per week.

Below is a link to my competitor channel for you to check out. These will give you a better understanding of the level of quality we require from you.

GRAVITY-TRANSFORMATION:
https://youtu.be/osFNIBnvnZ0?si=1t_t-uHMS7ZoRXl-

Requirements:
1.    Language proficiency (English)
2.    Professional software
3.    Response time of 24 hours or less
4.    Experience and knowledge of YouTube to AVOID copyright claims
5.    Experience with methods for HIGH audience retention
6.    Willing to work LONG TERM and grow with the TEAM
7. Professional and obsessed with doing the best job possible

Please provide samples of previous work to be considered for the position! We look forward to receiving your work.


Posted On: July 02, 2024 02:52 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:YouTube Video, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, YouTube Views, Video Production
Skills: YouTube Video, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, YouTube Views, Video Production
Country: USA
click to apply

item.title: Videographer - Upwork
item.description:
Seeking a videographer while in Los Angeles for an event in Santa Monica for our swimwear  business who has an event. we are seeking someone who can attend the even (21+) and shoot content of the day, BTS and just create and put together a video we can use on our socials, paid ads and TikTok. Also would love to see your portfolio if you have available.

item.title: Editing, Marketing, Advertising and Social Media - Upwork
item.description:
Hi

We have a Golf training aid called TRAIN YOUR PLANE

We are launching it into the U.S market soon

We need a TEAM (Company) that has EXTENSIVE experience who can provide the following services:
1. Edit our videos and photos
2. Create attractive and professional video social media ads
3. Create advertising campaigns and set up social media ads. We are thinking Facebook, YouTube, Instagram etc
4. Manage our social media ad campaigns and report to us weekly
4. Post and manage our social media content full time

We have a photo and video shoot scheduled in two weeks. We have a professional photographer and videographer here in Sydney we use, we will share these images and videos with you via Google Drive or Dropbox etc

We need to work closely with you to get RESULTS. We need to be able to see and monitor the results of the strategies, campaigns, advertising etc

We understand there are two costs to our business:
1. Monthly cost to use your full services
2. Monthly advertising spend

I have provided some sample images below, please look but do not use these images, as the product, logo and the product box are all being redesigned as we speak. We will obviously share all the new designs with the successful company in the near future

We will provide the instructions on what we want the social ads to include and look like so even your draft content in aligned with our intentions

Thanks, Glenn


Posted On: July 02, 2024 02:28 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Social Media Management, Social Media Content, Social Media Marketing, Video Editing & Production, Social Media Advertising
Skills: Social Media Management, Social Media Content, Social Media Marketing, Video Editing & Production, Social Media Advertising
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: TikTok Shorts Creator for MMORPG Upcoming Game - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented TikTok Shorts creator to produce 5 engaging shorts for our upcoming MMORPG game. Each short should be 10 to 13 seconds long, with a captivating 2-second hook to grab viewers' attention. The shorts should showcase the game's key features, stunning visuals, and exciting gameplay to generate interest among our target audience. As the creator, you will have creative freedom to develop unique and eye-catching content that aligns with our game's theme. The ideal candidate should have experience in creating TikTok shorts and a strong understanding of the gaming industry. Join our team and help us create viral content that will drive excitement and anticipation for our game's launch!

You will also be provided a set of gameplay videos (totalling about 180 minutes across 7 or so clips) in which you are expected to pull the shorts for tiktoks from. Additionally, you will be provided with reference TikTok gameplay shorts in which you are expected mostly use a inspiration from. We would want something similar

Skills required:
- Proficiency in TikTok content creation
- Strong storytelling and visual communication skills
- Knowledge of the gaming industry
- Ability to capture and edit engaging video footage
- Creativity and ability to think outside the box

In your application, send over links to tiktoks for MMORPG or similar style games you've done. Whether these tiktoks is a game intro, or shows off a feature. It doesn't matter. If possible, provide statistics to show that those tiktoks did well


Posted On: July 02, 2024 02:21 UTC
Category: Video Game Development
Skills:Video Production, Video Editing, Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, Game Design
Skills: Video Production, Video Editing, Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, Game Design
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: Experienced Youtube Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for an experienced YouTube video editor for a (Faceless) Fitness channel.
This is a LONG TERM position with GREAT benefits like bonuses and raises based on quality work and performance!
You are responsible for creating engaging 8-9 minutes video 1-2 times per week.

Below is a link to my competitors channel for you to check out. These will give you a better understanding of the level of quality we require from you.

1) EASY, ACTUALLY:
https://youtu.be/aiGlxpSCMD8?si=MDt_qp3a4wTrp2t5

OR


2) PICTUREFIT: https://youtube.com/@picturefit?si=9F1oOccAGQjsHb9H

Requirements:
1. ﻿﻿﻿Language proficiency (English)
2. ﻿﻿﻿Professional software
3. ﻿﻿﻿Response time of 24 hours or less
4. ﻿﻿﻿Experience and knowledge of YouTube to AVOID copyright claims
5. ﻿﻿﻿Experience with methods for HIGH audience retention
6. ﻿﻿﻿Willing to work LONG TERM and grow with the TEAM
7. Professional and obsessed with doing the best job possible

item.title: Freelance Video Product Tutorials for Travel Product - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for a freelance video editor who specialises in product tutorials for mobile applications.

We're looking at 3 videos to be created, each video will be about 45-60 seconds long. Screens will be provided for animation as well as instructions. Expected deliverable with motion graphics and instructions. Bonus if VO can be done (US based VOs will be preferred)

Output will be used on Youtube, Facebook, IG and more.

Brand colours and scheme, logo assets will be provided as well.

Looking for explainer videos, nothing complex but modern animation and motion graphic styles preferred (kinetic typography)

Budget: $1,200
Posted On: July 02, 2024 02:11 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:How To, YouTube Video, Video Animation, Adobe After Effects, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Explainer Video, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing
